meanings.sent1: In the park, many individuals were enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent2: The teacher made sure to address each individual student's needs.
meanings.sent3: The individuals in the library were so focused, they didn't notice the time passing.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as an individual puzzle piece in the big picture of life.
meanings.sent5: The individuals in the crowd stood out with their colorful outfits.

meanings.definition: A person regarded as a member of a particular group
meanings.sent1: The team celebrated the success of each of its individuals.
meanings.sent2: The company values the contributions of all individuals in the organization.
meanings.sent3: The individuals in the choir harmonized beautifully during the performance.
meanings.sent4: She considered herself an individual in the family of humanity.
meanings.sent5: The individuals in the club shared a common interest in gardening.
